sourcesContent:
Test component

{{MyText}}

import { Component, Input, OnChanges, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ templateUrl: './testing.component.html', selector: 'test-component' }) export class TestingComponent implements OnInit { show = false; MyText: string = "My Test String"; @Input('testInput') MyTestInput: string = ""; toggleShow() { this.show = !this.show; this.MyText = this.MyTestInput; } ngOnInit() { console.log("Init fired"); } }
